title: The Princess diaries
creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Mario Iscovich and Garry Marshall
brief_description: Mia Thermopolis is a bright but terribly shy and gawky teenager whose goal in life is to survive each school day with a minimum of attention and embarrassment. Unfortunately, her wish to be invisible is thwarted when her strict grandmother arrives and delivers the shocking news that she’s a real-life princess - heir to the throne of Genovia. Based on the novel by Meg Cabot. Cast includes Anne Hathaway, Heather Matarazzo, Hector Elizondo, Julie Andrews, Mandy Moore, Caroline Goodall.
